703074f-a.text:
Atlantic Ave., at Milford Street, showing a gateman manipulating the levers that operate the guard-rails, while a Long Island train rushes past. In the background, at the right, is a one story garage building at the northeast corner of Norwood Street. The train is on Atlantic Ave.
July 27, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
703074f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Milford Street, Brooklyn, NY
